title: be fitted, if necessary, with firefighting equipment suitably located but not as to obstruct the pas
clause_text: be fitted, if necessary, with firefighting equipment suitably located but not as to obstruct the passage, clearly marked and with its location clearly indicated on both sides of the exit way;

source_pdf.text_snippet: be fitted, if necessary, with firefighting equipment suitably located but not as to obstruct the passage, clearly marked and with its location clearly indicated on both sides of the exit way;
